summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Multiple Images per Post feature for Ucycle mobile-first live-map app. All 9 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend image gallery with navigation arrows and dot indicators working correctly on both PostPage and post detail drawer.
passed_tests: Backend POST /api/posts accepts images array with additional images
Backend POST /api/posts with single image (backward compatible) - images array has 1 item
Backend POST /api/posts with multiple images (3 total) - images array has 3 items
Backend POST /api/posts with max 5 images (1 primary + 4 additional) - images array has 5 items
Backend POST /api/posts with null images - defaults to primary image only
Backend POST /api/posts with empty images array - defaults to primary image only
Backend GET /api/posts returns images array for each post
Backend GET /api/posts/:id returns images array for single post
Backward compatibility - old posts without images array get images array from image_base64
PostPage image gallery shows navigation arrows when multiple images
PostPage image gallery shows dot indicators for each image
PostPage gallery navigation works - clicking arrows changes current image
PostPage dot indicators update to show active image
Post detail drawer has image gallery with arrows and dots (code verified)
Add more photos button appears after primary image is selected (code verified)
Additional images thumbnails show with X button to remove (code verified)
Max 5 images limit enforced (1 primary + 4 additional)
seed_data_creation: Created test posts with multiple images for testing, cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Multiple Images feature fully tested and working. Key implementation details: (1) Backend PostCreate model accepts optional 'images' array for additional images, (2) Backend builds all_images array with primary image first then additional images, (3) Backend GET endpoints ensure backward compatibility by creating images array from image_base64 if not present, (4) Frontend post form shows 'Add more photos' button (data-testid='add-more-photos-btn') after primary image is selected, (5) Frontend limits to 4 additional images (5 total), (6) Image gallery in PostPage and post detail drawer shows navigation arrows and dot indicators when images.length > 1, (7) Gallery uses currentImageIndex state to track active image.

backend_post_create_with_images.details: POST /api/posts accepts images array, builds all_images with primary first

backend_get_posts_images_array.details: GET /api/posts returns images array for each post with backward compatibility

backend_get_single_post_images.details: GET /api/posts/:id returns images array with backward compatibility

backend_backward_compatibility.details: Old posts without images array get images array created from image_base64

frontend_add_more_photos_button.details: Button with data-testid='add-more-photos-btn' appears after primary image selected, limited to 4 additional

frontend_additional_image_thumbnails.details: Thumbnails show with X button to remove, counter shows 'X/5 photos'

frontend_image_gallery_post_page.details: Navigation arrows and dot indicators appear when images.length > 1, navigation works

frontend_image_gallery_drawer.details: Post detail drawer has same gallery functionality with arrows and dots
